overview: Journalists Bo G. Andersson and Christoph Andersson travel in the wake of Bofors illegal gunpowder shops in the middle of the Iran-Iraq War. A story about lies and excuses. Mats Lundberg, then head of Marketing at Bofors, is seized with documents from the Stasi archives in Germany. Documents proving that Lundberg has been a frequent guest of the East Germans.
title: Den stora krutbluffen
